Summary: Social icons overlap the text in the button in a registration form. RU version, mobile

Steps_to_reproduce.2: Scroll page to the Присоединиться бесплатно button
Steps_to_reproduce.3: Click on the Присоединиться бесплатно button
Steps_to_reproduce.5: Scroll page to the Продолжить с … button

Expected result: Social icons and text are located in buttons in accordance with the mockup
Actual result: Social icons overlap the text in the button

Summary: Free shipping is ignored when calculating the total of the order
Preconditions: Log in to the personal account. Selected Delivery region is included in free area

Steps_to_reproduce.1: Open the catalog page of items *link*
Steps_to_reproduce.2: Select two books with mark *Better World Books* and add them to the shopping cart by clicking *add to cart* button
Steps_to_reproduce.3: Select one book without the mark *Better World Books* and add it to the shopping cart by clicking *add to cart* button
Steps_to_reproduce.4: Click to the shopping cart icon

Expected result: 3 items subtotal is equal to Total
Actual result: Shipping is included in total *Total isn't equal to subtotal*

Summary: Value for counter on cart icon is differ from actual items quantity in the cart
Preconditions: Log in to the personal account

Steps_to_reproduce.1: Open the catalog page of items *link*
Steps_to_reproduce.2: Select two books with mark *Better World Books* and add them to the shopping cart by clicking *add to cart* button
Steps_to_reproduce.3: Select one book without the mark *Better World Books* and add it to the shopping cart by clicking *add to cart* button
Steps_to_reproduce.4: Click to the shopping cart icon

Expected result: Number of product items is displayed correctly on the shopping cart icon *is displayed number 3*
Actual result: Number of product items is displayed incorrectly on the shopping cart icon *is displayed number 2*
